definition: Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan

sentences.english: From there, the road went across the Pamirs and continued to China.
sentences.chinese: 从那里去的道路跨越帕米尔高原，并继续中国。

definition: Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia

pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: the roof of the world/usually refers to Tibet or Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau 青藏高原[Qing1 Zang4 gao1 yuan2]

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
pinyin: Ka1 la3 kun1 lun2 Shan1 mai4

definition: Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia
Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang
Wakhan Corridor, joining Afghanistan and China (Xinjiang), and dividing Tajikistan from Pakistan
Qilian Mountains (formerly Richthofen Range), dividing Qinghai and Gansu provinces
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
Taxkorgan Tajik autonomous county (Tashqurqan Tajik aptonom nahiyisi) in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang
